== Kulasekharapuram (CT) (628364) ==

Kulasekharapuram (CT) is a town in the [[Karunagappally]] taluka of [[Kollam]] district with an area of 9.5 sq. km. and harbouring 6727 households with total population of 26907 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Kollam]] is at a distance of 28 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 98 km. Male population is 12691 and female population is 14216. Scheduled Caste population is 1622 and Scheduled Tribes population is 52. Census Location Code of the town is 628364<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class III (population_total 20,000 to 49,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Kollam (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 28 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Thiruvananthapuarm (m corp. + og) at a distance of 98 km. Railway station is at Karunagappally at a distance of 5 km.
